title: Black chicken curry
directions: Use less red chilli powder for a mild curry
In a pan heat 1 teaspoon of oil
When it is hot, add the chopped onion and fry until it turns brown
Then add the tomatoes and fry until they become soft
Add the chicken and fry gently on a low heat, until the chicken is almost cooked and water absorbed
Now add ginger and garlic paste and fry for 2 minutes
Add garam masala, chilli powder, coriander and turmeric and fry for 1 minute (take care not to burn the spices)
Add a little water and continue cooking for 5 minutes
When cooked, garnish with finely chopped coriander
ingredients: Use chicken thighs, drumsticks or wings. Serve with hot chapatis or rice.
1kg chicken (drumsticks, thighs, wings or boneless chicken portions), chopped
1 tsp red chilli powder (use less for a mild curry)
